events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund because this product is not what I paid for.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's report of receiving the incorrect product.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request related to the wrong item received by the customer.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I'm here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund smoothly?
Sure, the order number is 123456789. I'm attaching a photo of the incorrect item I received instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method and arrange for the wrong item to be returned at no cost to you.
That sounds great, thank you for handling this quickly. I appreciate your help with resolving this.
Your refund has been processed successfully and you will receive a confirmation email shortly. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
We just wanted to follow up and make sure that you have received your refund and that everything is now resolved to your satisfaction.
As the refund was completed and confirmed, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting customer support and have a great day!
